MIAMI BEACH'S NEWEST LIFESTYLE HOTEL!

Are you a unique individual, a trendsetter and an outside-the-box thinker?

Then...
The Washington Hotel Park is the place for YOU!

If you aspire to be the best at what you do, take pride in providing a fresh and unique guest experience and desire to work for a leader in the hospitality industry, then come work with us.

The Washington Park Hotel, is a collection of four vintage deco hotels, unified by a hospitality concept that's inspired by the creative life. Offering spaces where smart designs steals the guest's attention, Where people mix as easily as cocktails and unexpected conversations can lead to widely unexpected destinations.
